value.halfverse:
let me not be humiliated,
 nor let my enemies triumph over me.
value.verse:
To you, O LORD, I lift up my soul;
my God, I put my trust in you; *

value.halfverse: let the treacherous be disappointed in their schemes.
value.verse: Let none who look to you be put to shame; *

value.halfverse: and teach me your paths.
value.verse: Show me your ways, O LORD, *
Lead me in your truth and teach me, *
value.halfverse:
for you are the God of my salvation;
 in you have I trusted all the day long.

value.verse: Remember, O LORD, your compassion and love, *
value.halfverse: for they are from everlasting.

remember me according to your love
 and for the sake of your goodness, O LORD.
value.verse: Remember not the sins of my youth and my transgressions; *

value.halfverse: therefore he teaches sinners in his way.
value.verse: Gracious and upright is the LORD; *
He guides the humble in doing right *
value.halfverse: and teaches his way to the lowly.
to those who keep his covenant and his testimonies.
value.verse: All the paths of the LORD are love and faithfulness *

value.halfverse: forgive my sin, for it is great.
value.verse: For your Nameâ€™s sake, O LORD, *
Who are they who fear the LORD? *
value.halfverse: he will teach them the way that they should choose.
and their offspring shall inherit the land.
value.verse: They shall dwell in prosperity, *

value.halfverse: and will show them his covenant.
value.verse: The LORD is a friend to those who fear him *

value.halfverse: for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
value.verse: My eyes are ever looking to the LORD, *
Turn to me and have pity on me, *
value.halfverse: for I am left alone and in misery.

value.verse: The sorrows of my heart have increased; *
value.halfverse: bring me out of my troubles.
and forgive me all my sin.
value.verse: Look upon my adversity and misery *

value.halfverse: and they bear a violent hatred against me.
value.verse: Look upon my enemies, for they are many, *

value.halfverse: let me not be put to shame, for I have trusted in you.
value.verse: Protect my life and deliver me; *
Let integrity and uprightness preserve me, *
value.halfverse: for my hope has been in you.

value.verse: Deliver Israel, O God, *
value.halfverse: out of all his troubles.
